articles.content: If more Americans don't get vaccinated, there is "ample chance" of another coronavirus variant emerging, one that could be more aggressive and more pervasive than the delta variant, Dr. Anthony Fauci… [+7514 chars]

articles.title: Most unvaccinated Americans believe coronavirus vaccine poses greater health risk than the disease, poll finds - Flipboard
